title: Does anyone else think it's weird how they can only use the original soundtrack for the trailers?
self_text: Seriously I thought there would be more music from the game in the trailer. There were a bunch of songs used but nothing that was actually in the game. I feel like they're just using whatever works with the visuals.

title: What do you guys think about the new update?
self_text: The devs said they were going to make it more difficult but its just frustrating when something so simple has so many issues. They’ve added in more content but it still isn’t fun because the game is too punishing.  The current problems include:   1.  Too much grind for things like resources/gold   2.  Some bosses are just out-right broken and can easily kill a player with under 30% health left (like the last boss on the third tier)  3.  Can't properly see what is around you in most areas (even after upgrading your vision)   4.  There’s no way to upgrade the tools or weapons other than by spending gold which makes them almost useless without grinding for hours.   5.  So many bugs! It feels like they haven’t actually tested the game at all before releasing it.  What are your thoughts on how the developers should fix these issues?

title: Pushing me for marriage?
self_text: My girlfriend asked if we could move in together and get married within two years. She says she's ready for marriage and kids.  I said I don't know if I'm ready for marriage yet, but I do want to live with her and build our lives together. She got mad at me and said "you're just stalling" or something like that. I didn't say anything about wanting to get married now. She seems really angry, so I can't talk to her right now. Does that sound like she's being unreasonable? Is it normal for her to get mad like that when I said I'm not ready for marriage yet?  Edit: I'm not trying to rush into anything, and I do love her. I just need time to think about it.

title: Is it normal to feel bad about not having friends?
self_text: Hi everyone!  I'm 24 years old and I recently realized that I don't have any close friends. I've always been kind of awkward in social situations so I've never really put myself out there. I used to have a few friends back in high school but they all moved away after we graduated. Now I just mostly hang out with my family or play video games by myself. I know it's probably nothing major, but I can't shake this feeling of loneliness that creeps up on me sometimes. Is it weird for someone my age to not have any close friends? How do I go about making new ones? Thanks for your time.

title: Is it possible to have more than one partner?
self_text: My wife and I have been together for over 20 years but we both recently met someone else who has expressed interest in us. She doesn't know about him yet but I do. He wants to get serious with me but she and I aren't sure what to do. Do we tell her? How would we go about doing so? If we don't tell her does she eventually find out? We’ve never had an argument or anything like that since we started dating. What should we do?

title: Why do they call it “the end”?
self_text: The credits roll and then you realize you’re in your room alone. There's nothing else. You don't have anyone to talk to. The movie ended but life hasn’t. That's why it feels like the end.

title: Is it wrong to call people "dude" when they ask me what's up?
self_text: I was talking to my friend earlier and he asked me what's up and I said "Dude". He laughed at me and told me not to do it again. Should I continue calling them dude? Or should I just use their name?

title: Can I use my phone camera in the game?
self_text: I know it's not recommended but can I use my phone camera in the game? I don't have an Xbox and the console isn't available in my country. I wanted to record myself playing but I want to do it with my phone. Is there any way to do it without buying a console?

title: Do any of you play Skyrim?
self_text: Yeah, I do! What are your favorite things about it?

title: Does anyone else find it weird when their friends don't seem to be progressing in their lives?  Like they aren't getting married or having kids and they are almost my age.  It feels like they aren't doing anything with their lives.  I am not saying they should do anything but I feel like something is wrong.  They have jobs and families and everything but I don't understand why they haven't done things that I think everyone "should" do by now.  For example, I got married at 25 and had my first kid at 27.  My friend just turned 30 and she still doesn't even know if she wants kids.  What’s going on?
self_text: Is there anything wrong with me for feeling this way?

title: Is it possible for me to have a normal life?
self_text: I’ve been in therapy for a while now and I think I’m starting to get out of my depression/anxiety, but there are still things I can't do. Like being around people or even talking on the phone. It’s like if someone calls me or tries to talk to me, I just freeze up completely and lose my mind. I don’t know what to do about it. I have trouble sleeping too and I’m constantly exhausted. I was wondering if anyone else has had similar issues with social anxiety and how they got past them. Also, how long does it take until a person feels comfortable enough to talk to another person?

title: What's your favorite food?
self_text: Just curious. No need to give me recipes or anything. Just what do you like!

title: What’s your favorite thing to do on an empty server?
self_text: I know it’s not something many people do but I find myself getting bored and just wandering around with no goals or objectives.  What do you guys do in these situations?

title: How can i deal with my friend who thinks he’s better than everyone else?
self_text: He does everything in his power to make sure everyone knows how good he is at something or how much more money/success/etc he has than others. Also he tends to talk about himself all the time and never listens when other people speak. I don’t know what to do.

title: Is it worth playing through the entire game again and upgrading my equipment from level 1?
self_text: I’m on my second playthrough and I want to play through the whole game again but I want to make sure I’m fully prepared for the challenges ahead.  I was wondering if it would be worth investing in my gear before starting the game again or should I just focus on getting through the main story?

title: Is it weird to ask if someone would like to join me on a long drive across the country?
self_text: I'm an adult who has been living in the same city for about 10 years and haven't made any friends or known people outside my immediate family. I was thinking about driving cross country and thought maybe I could meet up with other travelers along the way, but I have no idea how to go about making that happen.  So I asked around online about meeting new people, and a friend suggested I offer rides to others going on road trips.   I ended up posting on Reddit asking if anyone would want to take a ride with me.  There were about 3 responses from strangers.   One person said they wouldn't want to just sit in the car, but asked if I wanted them to join me when I stopped at a place they were visiting.   Another person said they didn't want to make a long trip out of it, but they'd be happy to meet up when I got close to their location.   The third person said they'd love to join me! So we're talking about a few different scenarios here.   It seems odd that strangers would agree to get in the car with a complete stranger, but I think it might be possible.  I guess it depends on the people I talk to.  I don't really care where I'm going, I just want to have company.   Is there anything wrong with wanting to do this? Should I be worried? Would I come off as creepy?  Should I ask more specific questions to help them feel comfortable?

title: Should I have an emergency fund?
self_text: I want to be financially responsible and save money for retirement, but I also don't want to miss out on life experiences or make impulsive purchases because I think I should always be saving.  I'm 24 years old and work full time in a stable job with benefits.  My monthly income is around $3500 after taxes.  My expenses are about $1800/month, which leaves me with about $1700 leftover each month. I am currently not saving anything.  I live in California and cost of living is very high here. My apartment costs me $1000/month, and my car payments cost me $300/month. I also pay student loans at a rate of $250/month.   I would like to start saving money, but I want to know if it makes sense to put away something like $10,000 - $20,000 into an emergency fund first before starting to save for retirement.   I'd prefer to keep my savings account balance around $5000-6000. What do you guys think?

title: Has anyone else noticed how much longer it takes to get into their house?
self_text: Just wondering if I'm crazy or if others have noticed that getting into my house feels like an eternity these days.  I'm talking about when I go downstairs and turn on the lights in the living room. When I used to live here, it would take about half a second. Now it feels like it's taking 1-2 seconds.

title: Why do they call it “The Game” when it’s just an open world game?
self_text: This makes no sense. They could have called it something else like “The Life.” Or even something more specific. But why "The Game"?

title: My roommate is being an idiot
self_text: My roommate keeps leaving his dirty dishes in the sink for days and when I bring it up he says “I’ll do them later” but then never does. He also leaves his socks everywhere and doesn't clean up after himself. Am I being too demanding or should I just let it go?

title: Are there any official stats about the number of players on the game?
self_text: I'm not sure if it's public information, but would be interesting to know how many people play the game in total.  Like, for example, how much money has been spent by users so far and the total number of active users at any point in time.

title: Is it normal for me to not have anything in my inventory?
self_text: I just did a quest where I was supposed to get some materials from a dead enemy and there was nothing left in my inventory after the boss fight. Then I went on another quest and again nothing after the boss fight.  I've tried opening my inventory but it's empty.  Is this normal?

title: Is it ok for me to ask my partner to give up their hobbies?
self_text: My partner has quite a few hobbies and loves them. They do not have much free time because they spend most of it doing these hobbies and there isn't really enough time for us to spend together. I find it hard to feel like we spend quality time together sometimes because they are always doing something else. I asked if they would be willing to cut back on their hobbies so we could spend more time together but they refused. Do I sound like a jerk? Am I being unreasonable? What should I do?

title: Is it weird to ask your boss if he can give you a raise?
self_text: I'm in my first year at the company and my job has been pretty good so far. My boss hasn't talked about raises much but when asked for performance reviews he always says "you're doing great" and "keep up the good work".  I know my salary isn't amazing and could use an increase but I don't want to seem like I'm just asking for something.  What do you guys think? Should I ask or wait until my next review?

title: My mom called me and asked if I was thinking about getting married, I said no, she asked why, I said because I'm not looking for someone to share my life with, she said "why would you say that?" I told her it's because I don't want anyone else to tell me what to do, so now she's mad at me for saying I won't get married
self_text: Am I the asshole?

title: Does anyone else find it weird how they just randomly start giving out the number for their next of kin?
self_text: Like, when I was buying my new license last month I asked them what information would go on there and they said "next of kin" so I asked them if they'd actually ask me about that in case of death and they just said "it's required" or something like that. That's kind of creepy tbh.

title: Do you guys think I'm being a little harsh?
self_text: My partner and I have been dating for about 6 months now. He has been really great up until now and I love him so much. But lately he's been spending more time on his phone than with me or talking to me. I don't know how to get it across to him without making him feel bad because I love him so much and don't want to hurt his feelings. Does anyone else ever experience this?

title: Is it okay if my girlfriend doesn't want to go out with me on weekends?
self_text: My girlfriend doesn’t really like going out and only wants to stay in or do things at home. She says she likes quiet time but when I ask her to do something outside of the house she gets mad and tells me to leave her alone. I love her so much and don’t want our relationship to fail but am feeling pretty hurt because we haven’t been able to do anything fun together since we’ve started dating. Does this sound like normal behavior for a girl to act towards a guy who has feelings about their relationship?

title: Do you think it's weird if I want my girlfriend to go out with me?
self_text: My girlfriend wants to spend all her free time at home and isn't very interested in going out with me or meeting my friends. She says she likes spending time alone, but I feel like we don't have any shared experiences because of it. Is this normal? And if so, how can I deal with it?

title: My friend keeps calling me a “bro” even though we’re both women and have been friends for 10 years
self_text: Sorry if this seems dumb but my friend has started using the word “bro” when she talks to me. We’ve been friends since middle school and always used each other’s names. She says it’s just how she talks, but it feels weird coming from her. Am I overreacting?

title: Can I transfer my credits from one account to another?
self_text: I’ve just recently bought the game and now I am thinking about buying the deluxe edition. But I don’t know if it will transfer my credits/xp into the new account or not.

title: Do you have any suggestions on how to best deal with an annoying family member?
self_text: My brother has been bothering me for years now and I don't know how to stop him. He can't ever seem to leave me alone and I just want to get away from him. I've tried speaking with him about it but he always brushes it off and says "You just need to accept me" which isn't really helpful because my goal isn't to accept him, but rather to not have him constantly bother me. Is there anything else I could try?

title: Is it okay if my mom doesn't call me every day?
self_text: My mom has always been super busy and rarely calls. I usually do the calling and she doesn't call back unless I reach out first. It's been like this since I was little.  I know she loves me but I feel like she doesn't make an effort to talk to me. I understand that people have different schedules and lives but she still seems really uninterested in hearing about what I'm doing.  Is it weird or wrong for me to feel this way?

title: What's your favorite thing about being an adult?
self_text: It’s nice to have no responsibilities and be able to do whatever I want whenever I want.  I feel like my life is finally starting.

title: I have no idea what i am doing so i need advice!
self_text: Okay so like im in my late 20s and just started working a job. Its not even much work, it's just helping out people with their computer stuff. But now i want to get a girlfriend? How do i do that?! Is there something like a formula to find someone perfect for me?

title: What is the best way to get rid of a persistent cold sweat?
self_text: My wife and I have been spending the last week in bed with a nasty cold. She got over it quickly but I've had a weird problem where my shirt will be damp from what looks like sweat even when I'm not exercising or sweating. It happens at random times throughout the day and night and always leaves a wet ring on the chest of my shirts.  It isn't hot like feverish sweat, just really damp.  We went to the doctor for her cold and he said she didn't have any signs of infection so we figured it was just a bad case of a cold.  I took a urine test for prostate health which came back normal.  My body temperature is normal, I'm sleeping properly and eating enough.  Does anyone have an idea what might be going on here?

title: Is it okay if my ex wants to have friends with me?
self_text: We broke up like 2 months ago and we were together for 3 years. Now she’s trying to add me on social media and messaging me just to chat. I'm not interested but I don't want to hurt her feelings or make things worse. I still have feelings for her, so it's hard. She doesn't seem to notice how much i hate that she keeps messaging me. So basically, am I an asshole for wanting to cut off all contact with her and block her everywhere? Or do I need to try to find a middle ground where we can be friends?

title: Is it bad that I’m thinking about my ex while we’re on a date?
self_text: My ex and I were broken up a few months ago because she wanted to move to another state for work, but since I didn't want to leave my family and friends, we decided to break up. We still talk occasionally though and sometimes go out to eat. I just feel like after a few weeks, I started wanting her again and even started doing things I did when we were together. I know that I should probably just move on with my life and not think about her, but it’s hard.  I tried talking to my best friend about it, and he said that it's ok to have those feelings, but he also said that if I start thinking about her too much, I need to cut off contact with her. I don’t wanna do that because we still have good memories together, but at the same time, I’m worried that I’m going to keep dwelling on her forever. Am I the asshole here?

title: Is it stupid to ask my dad if he thinks I'm weird?
self_text: My mom keeps telling me that she thinks I'm weird and I don't like it. When I asked her why, she said she doesn't know but thinks I act different than other kids my age. So now I've been asking my dad what he thinks about it too, but he hasn't answered yet. Like, should I even bother asking him, or would it just hurt his feelings?

title: The weirdest thing I've ever seen in an RPG was when a player died and their character didn't disappear but instead became a ghost haunting the game. It was pretty cool at first but then they started using it to get extra loot by scaring the monsters into giving them stuff. At first I thought it was cool but eventually it got annoying so the GM banned the ability.  I'm just wondering what other crazy things people have seen happen in RPGs?
self_text: Just curious!  My friend told me about it today and it made me think about all sorts of crazy RPG moments.

title: Is there any point in starting an RPG online?
self_text: My friend and I have been discussing it for months now.  We've both spent countless hours playing different RPGs over the years, but we've never actually started creating our own, or even joining an existing one. We're just not sure if there's any real value in doing so. There are tons of people already making their own worlds and characters, and plenty of others who want to play them, but it seems like it would require way too much time and effort to make something worth while.  I wanted to ask what the actual benefits of making your own RPG are, considering how many others are already doing it.  What motivates people to do this, besides just wanting to make a game? Also, has anyone ever joined an existing RPG world and found it worthwhile? Are there good ways to get involved with other players once you've made your world?

title: Is it okay for me to not like something my wife likes?
self_text: My wife loves going to antique shops and buying old knick-knacks she doesn't need. She spends a lot of money on them and is always excited about finding a new "treasure." I find her hobby really annoying because I think she’s wasting her money and there’s nothing cool about it. When we go shopping together, I don't enjoy myself at all.  I love my wife very much and am happy with our lives. However, I have started to feel resentful when she brings home another trinket or talks excitedly about it. I’ve tried talking to her about how I feel, but she gets defensive and says I’m being unsupportive of her hobbies. I know I shouldn’t be judging her hobbies, but I just can’t shake the feeling that she's wasting her money and it bothers me a lot. Am I an asshole for feeling this way?

title: Are there any games with similar mechanics to Dark Souls that don't have the same tone?
self_text: I love dark souls but it can be really bleak and depressing.  I was looking for something like it mechanically, i.e. slow paced combat with heavy armor and stamina management, but not necessarily the bleak story and atmosphere.

title: Is it weird if my mom says she's going to start taking care of my family after she has been married for 10 years?
self_text: My mom wants me to have a baby and now she tells me that she will take care of them once they were born and raise them. She said that she doesn't want me to work so hard and she told me that she already had a plan in mind to make sure that we won't have any financial problems. What do you guys think about this situation? Does it seem like she's trying to control our lives or just being nice and helpful?

title: Can I use my phone to record something or am I going to have to buy an external recorder?
self_text: Do you guys think it would be okay to use your phones camera to record something for evidence and if so what settings should I put on it?

title: Has anyone used YNAB?
self_text: My wife and I want to get into budgeting but we don't know where to start. We have a bit of money saved up for emergencies, and we make around $60k/year together. Is there anything in particular you would recommend before starting out?

title: Is it ok if I don't have any money saved up for when my partner dies?
self_text: My partner died from cancer and i ended up not having enough savings to cover their funeral costs so I had to borrow money. They passed away a few months ago and now I am struggling with debt. Do I need to get more savings before something like this happens again?

title: Is it okay to have multiple girlfriends at once?
self_text: My girlfriend and I broke up about a month ago because she wanted to move across the country. She told me she was going to start dating again soon but never said anything about wanting to date multiple people at once. I ended up meeting someone recently who I really like and think we have great chemistry. I haven't told my ex-girlfriend about this person yet. I feel bad for lying to her about not dating anyone else. Should I tell her or keep going with my current feelings?

title: Is it weird if my friend knows about my girlfriend?
self_text: We're both in our early twenties and she doesn't know about my friend. He found out from a mutual friend that we were dating but he didn't tell me because he said he thought it was weird. Now, he's been ignoring me for like a week and hasn't texted or called me. Do I have a right to be upset that he didn't tell me about her? Or am I overreacting?

title: Is it okay for me to ask if she wants to take her phone away from her when she goes on dates with me?
self_text: She always takes her phone and looks at her Instagram or TikTok while we're out together. I don't want to make her feel like I am being controlling but sometimes I get so frustrated that she's not paying attention to me. I asked her why she does it and she said "I just need to check in and see what people are doing".  I understand that but I wish she would put it away and just focus on spending time with me instead. Do I come off too possessive by asking her to do this?

title: Is there any way to get rid of the annoying player who keeps coming into my game and immediately starting a fight?  I'm just trying to do my own thing at my own pace, and he just won't let me be.  The problem is that when he starts fighting, it will always end in my death, so I can never even retaliate or escape.  Is there any way to make him stop doing that, without quitting the game?  He is very aggressive and won't ever give me space.
self_text: If anyone knows how to get rid of these players, please tell me!  Or if you know what to do to avoid them, please tell me!

title: Is it possible to have more than one soulmate?
self_text: I’ve heard people say that there can only be one soulmate for each person. That sounds so depressing and limiting.  I mean, what if someone I really care about isn't my soulmate? Do I just need to move on and never see them again?  Does this mean that if you’re in love with someone, they’re not your soulmate? Or vice versa?  What if there aren't any soulmates? What does that even mean then?  It just seems like such an overblown concept.

title: Is it normal for my dentist to offer me root canals?
self_text: I recently got an x-ray taken by my dentist and he said I have a cavity in my tooth that would require a root canal. I've never had a root canal before, and I'm wondering if that's really necessary or if he was just trying to upsell me on something more expensive.

title: The most annoying thing about having an iPhone?
self_text: Okay so here’s the deal, I have been using my iPhone for years and it has gotten to the point where it annoys me more than anything. This isn’t about features or performance, just the things that get on my nerves. I know everyone loves their iPhones but I don’t really like them that much anymore.  So what is the most annoying thing about having an iPhone to you?  I think it’s the constant ads and promotions. Like, every time I open an app I get an ad for something!  It’s also when Apple tries to “improve” something with software updates. For example, they changed the way the volume buttons work on the newest iPhones, which made it harder to adjust the volume because you had to use two fingers instead of one. That was incredibly frustrating.  Or how they change the phone settings in iOS every year.  What do you guys think?  And it's not like other phones do that either.  Android phones seem to stay the same and only add features if you buy the new model.  So yeah… I just wanted to talk about this and see what others thought.

title: Am I the ass here?
self_text: My partner and I have been together for about 2 years now, we live together and have been talking about getting married since about 6 months ago. Last night my partner told me she's not ready to marry me yet because she said I don't show her enough affection and wants me to be more affectionate with her.  I showed her how I'm naturally affectionate by cuddling when she falls asleep or if she has a nightmare, holding her hand while watching movies, and giving her hugs whenever I see her. She said these things aren't enough, so she suggested I try to do more things that would make her happy, such as buying her flowers and going out on dates.  I said I didn't know what she wanted from me, so she gave me a list of 10 things she wants me to do. I took her list and started doing all of those things but it feels forced and unnatural to me. Then last night she said she was tired of me trying to please her so she asked me to stop trying so hard.  She then said she doesn't want to get married until she knows I truly love her.  So I went over to her house, sat down and told her that I loved her and told her I was willing to work on making her happier but I wasn't going to force myself to change just to satisfy her wishes.  When I got home she blocked me on everything.  Do I need to apologize or should I leave her alone for a bit before reaching out again?

title: Am I the asshole?
self_text: My wife and I were talking about buying a house together but she's not sure if she wants to buy a house because her mom has told her she should live with her mother when she gets older. She just doesn't want to move in with her mom for the rest of her life, which means she won't be able to afford her own house. So we can't buy anything together. But I don't want to force her into a situation she doesn't want to do. But if we don't get a house, then we won't have any financial security. I feel like I'm getting no where.

title: Am I being an idiot for saying I don't want my boyfriend to have any friends?
self_text: My boyfriend doesn't like having too many friends and he wants me to not make any either. He says it's because he likes only being around me, but I get a weird vibe from him when he talks about his friends. Like he's annoyed they even exist. I feel bad if I make new friends because then he gets sad, but I also don't want to change myself to please him. Does this sound normal?

title: Is it weird if I want to play on PC but my friends only play on console?
self_text: My friends and I have been playing together for years now on console, but I recently got an RTX 3080 and decided to upgrade my pc. The thing is, they aren't too interested in joining me because they say it would require them to buy a new pc. But I really enjoy playing with my friends so I was wondering if it's odd to want to play on PC or if I should just stick to console.

title: Are we all just trying to get out of our own heads?
self_text: Sometimes it feels like everyone's head is just a terrible place to be in and they're all trapped there. Like they don't know how to leave and have created an elaborate prison for themselves.  I think a lot of people are also just lonely so they create these imaginary worlds or scenarios where they're not alone. Is it weird to think that way about other people? Or am I just feeling super introspective today?

title: Why does every single time someone asks for a screenshot they ask me if I can send it to them?
self_text: I'm sick of it.  It's always something like "Hey, could you send me a screenshot of your game?" or "Can you send me a screenshot of what you see on screen?"  I'm not sure why people do this.  Is there some sort of weird screenshot sharing protocol that I don't know about?  Do they think they're doing me a favor?  Are they just trying to get me to share my screenshots with random strangers?  Why do they always ask me if I can send it TO THEM?!

title: Poring in armor
self_text: Is it possible for poring to use full set armor? If so what's the best set to use for them?

title: Why do they call it “the big apple”?
self_text: I just found out today that New York City is nicknamed "The Big Apple" and I'm completely baffled. What does it mean? Where did it come from? Is there any historical significance?

title: Is there any way to change my account’s default currency?
self_text: Hi everyone!  I have recently changed country and now want to use a different default currency in my account. Can I do this through the settings or do I need to contact support? Thank you for your time!

title: How do you decide what to buy when there's so many things that you want?
self_text: I just bought a new game and now I feel like I need to spend more money on games. If I don't buy something I want it makes me sad. Do you guys have a system for managing your spending or do you just go with whatever?

title: Do you think the game will have more than 150 different bosses?
self_text: I was reading an article today about how there's only been 27 bosses in the entire series so far and it made me realize how little there actually are! Now I am thinking that they might add even more bosses in future DLC or expansions for the game. What do you guys think?

title: Does anyone know how much money goes into the state coffers from people who take out loans for college?  (I'm not talking about student loans, just regular bank loans)
self_text: So there are tons of articles and stuff on student loan debt, but I haven't seen any discussion around what happens with other types of loans.  Like, if someone takes out a personal loan or a small business loan to pay for college tuition, where does that go?  Does it go to the state?   It seems like there would be a huge amount of money going into the state treasury, which could then be used to lower tuition costs or improve schools.  I saw something once about California doing this but didn't find anything concrete about it.

title: Can you transfer an old console's save file to a new console?
self_text: I have a PS3, and it's been broken for awhile now. My brother gave me his old PS3, but the save files on it were deleted long ago. Is there any way to transfer my save files from my broken PS3 to the new one he bought?

title: Is it normal for me to not know what my friends have been doing lately?
self_text: I've recently lost touch with most of my close friends and have had some people leave my life. I don't know why I feel like I'm missing out on things they're going through but if I asked them about it they would say it doesn't matter or they wouldn't want to talk about it.  I'm fine being alone when I'm at home but I just get really anxious when I go out and see them doing something new with other people.  Is this a sign I'm having trouble letting go of past relationships or am I just a bad friend?

title: Is it bad if I don't want my parents to know about my online activities?
self_text: My mom keeps asking me what I am doing online and asks for passwords when I ask her to help with something. Should I just tell her or should I lie to protect my privacy?

title: My wife is obsessed with buying us stuff from her friends and family
self_text: I love my wife but she’s always buying things for me and her from people she knows.  It's not like she asks if I want it or anything, just assumes I’ll like it.  She did this last week and bought me an expensive watch from her brother.  I said I didn’t need another watch and she got upset because “he wanted to do something nice.”   Is this weird? Am I the asshole?

title: Am I being an idiot?
self_text: So my family has a tradition where every year we get together and everyone brings something they've made from scratch over the last year. This year I brought a wooden box with a few things in it that I carved.  My mom said she didn't like it and asked me why I made it so boring. My dad says he doesn't think I'm talented because he can carve better than me. My siblings just laughed at it and told me I shouldn't waste my time on something I wasn't good at. I was really proud of what I made and felt like I did well with it, but now I don't know if I should continue doing this or just quit. What do I do?

title: Is it weird if my dad always gives me money?
self_text: My dad has been giving me money for years now but not in a way where he's trying to control me or anything like that. Just seems like every time I need something, or even just have an idea about buying something, he says "Here take this" and I just take it. He's never asked why I needed the money, just gave it. Now, he recently said that he wants to give me $1000 next week because he heard I was thinking about getting a new video card and told me to go ahead and do it.  I don't know what to think. He's been doing this since high school when I needed a new pair of shoes. I've thanked him every single time but I feel like there should be some kind of boundary here. I can't help but wonder if I should tell him how I feel and ask him to stop. What do you guys think?

title: Any tips for getting better at the game?
self_text: I'm still pretty new to the game, and i really enjoy it, but i am having a hard time with my score. I have been trying to do some training missions to improve my skills, but it just doesn't seem to be helping me much.   I usually play solo in single player mode, which means that there isn't any competition or anything else like that.   Can anyone give me some tips on how i can get better at the game?

title: Is it dumb to ask for something expensive?
self_text: My girlfriend is planning a surprise trip and asked what I want for my birthday. I said I'd love an Apple Watch but she said she wouldn't spend that much money on me.   I didn’t think anything about it at the time but now I feel like an idiot because $700+ is a lot of money.   She says that I shouldn’t expect her to buy me something so expensive because she doesn't make that much money.   Does this sound dumb? Should I have just said "whatever" or should I tell her how I feel?

title: My girlfriend left me for my best friend
self_text: I've been with my best friend for about 2 years now. We have been dating for 6 months. He has a girlfriend who he's been with for 4 years. I was shocked when she told me they were breaking up and that he was moving in with her. I asked him why and he said he wanted to try things out with me.  I don't know what to do. I feel betrayed by both of them. I love my best friend but I want to know how he could leave his girlfriend. Am I being an idiot? What should I do?

title: Can anyone confirm the new payment system in skyrim will work with the mod for buying houses?
self_text: Hi there!  I was wondering if anyone has confirmation that the new payment system works with the house buying mod I’ve been looking into.   It seems like it should, but I can’t find any concrete answers.  Thanks!

title: Is there an official release date for the game?
self_text: No. There isn't. The devs haven't stated any. It will come when they're ready and it'll come on their terms. Don't push them about it, just wait and enjoy the small bits of content they do drop.  They can't force a release date like that.   It won't be a rushed mess either. They have said they don't want to rush this game at all.   I think the devs are enjoying themselves and having fun with the game so far and aren't feeling pressured by people wanting more or asking when the game comes out. Just let them keep making the game how they want to make it.  That being said, the developers have recently released a small update adding a few new features.  So maybe we will get something sooner than expected... but it could also be nothing.   It doesn't matter. As long as they're happy, we'll be happy.

title: Anyone else think that the player counts in the game are incredibly low?
self_text: Just wondering if anyone else thinks that it's weird how few people are playing the game right now? Like, the servers were so full when it first released, but now it feels like everyone went back to other games.

title: Is it a bad idea to do my taxes in December?
self_text: I'm usually pretty good at keeping track of income and expenses throughout the year, but I always end up procrastinating on doing my taxes until the last possible moment. This past year was particularly rough, and I've been working odd hours with different contracts, so things got complicated. The tax deadline is coming up next week, and I still haven't filed anything yet. I know I should probably get this done ASAP, but I feel like I need to take some time to really review everything and make sure I don't miss any deductions or credits.  Is there any harm in filing my taxes in December, even if it's technically after the deadline? I'm not worried about getting penalized for late filing (because I'm pretty sure I'll have everything together by then), but I am worried about missing out on potential refunds.

title: What is your favorite thing about being a gamer?
self_text: My favorite thing about being a gamer is that no matter what life throws at me, there's always something to do and enjoy. Games can bring people together and provide an escape from reality. Plus they're just super fun!

title: Is it dumb to ask for something that would make someone else happy?
self_text: My friend recently broke up with his girlfriend and asked me what I wanted for my birthday so he could get me something nice. He didn't even ask if I needed anything or want anything! Just asked what I wanted him to get me.  I told him he should buy me whatever makes him feel good, but then he went and got me a random little trinket from the dollar store.   It's not about the gift itself, it's more about the thought process behind it.  Does it seem weird to give a gift based on what *you* want instead of what *they* need or like?

title: Am I being an idiot?
self_text: I’ve been having feelings for someone for a while now and they seem to like me too but we haven't gone on any dates. We met at school so we have a lot in common.  We talk online sometimes though it’s not a whole lot because I don’t want to be clingy or anything.   I just wanna ask them out already.  But how do you go about doing this? Like if they don’t say yes what then? Do I just give up?  What if they aren’t interested?  If they say no would it be weird to ask them why?   Like am I overthinking things?  Do I just get over it eventually?  Am I an idiot?

title: Does anyone else get really annoyed when they have to do the dishes after eating?
self_text: No matter how much I want to eat something quick and easy, I always end up having to wash my plate and utensils. Why does this happen? Is it me? Do people just generally feel like doing this?

title: What do you guys think about the amount of people playing the game?
self_text: I just want to see if my thoughts on this are correct or not!

title: Is it weird for me to want my dad to stop calling me?
self_text: My dad calls me every day at least twice and sometimes more depending on how busy he is. He says its because he misses me but I miss him too so it feels weird when he keeps calling just out of habit.  I'm not saying I don't love him or anything like that, but I am starting to feel like he can't read me and needs to respect my boundaries. I've tried telling him I just need less contact and he always tells me he doesn't understand why and insists that he just wants to make sure I'm okay. I'm getting really frustrated with his constant contact and would like to start setting up times when he can call me instead of just whenever he wants. I know its probably a bit rude to tell him that but i don't know how else to get across that I don't want him calling me all the time.  What do I do?

title: Can I start a new game if my character dies?
self_text: Yes or no. I have been playing the last few days and got to level 20, then died in a cave while soloing it.  I do not want to start over from level 1 again.  Is there any way around it?

title: Am I the asshole?
self_text: My wife has been having an on again off again affair with her boss for the last six months and hasn't told me. She said she was going to tell me but didn't know how and then she felt bad about lying so she kept it secret. Now she wants to make up with me and says that she loves me and that she never wanted to hurt me or our family. I don't know what to do. Do I trust her? How can I move on if I don't know if I can ever truly trust her?

title: Do I have to get vaccinated before I can go back to school?
self_text: My mom wants me to but my dad says it's not mandatory unless you live in a specific area or something like that. They both say they just want me to be safe and healthy. Like I’m not going to die from COVID or anything. So, do I have to get vaccinated for school or am I just overthinking?

title: Is it me or does anyone else get really bored when they're alone?
self_text: I have been feeling super bored and unmotivated lately when I'm alone. Like my mind just kind of wanders away from anything and I can't focus on doing anything for too long.  I am not sure if it's because I've been working a lot recently and I need to get used to being around people more again or something, but I don't know what to do about it.  Does anyone else get like this sometimes?  Any tips on how to deal with it?

title: Is it weird to have multiple accounts on the same console?
self_text: I was wondering if there's any issues with having multiple accounts on the same PS5. Like if one account is playing something online, does it affect the other account? Or can both play at the same time without affecting each other? Thanks!

title: What is the best way to use the new controller features?
self_text: Just wondering if anyone knows how to best utilize the controller features on the new PS5

title: Am I being an idiot?
self_text: My wife has been with me for almost 5 years and we have a 3 year old together.  I've been having feelings for someone else at work and I know it's wrong but I can't help it.  I don't want to hurt my wife or our daughter, so I haven't said anything.   I'm trying to ignore these feelings but they keep coming back.  Is there any way to just block them out? Or should I tell my wife something?  She doesn't even know I exist besides her coworker who tells her everything.  I feel like I'm going crazy.

title: Are there any good servers for people who like playing games on their phones?
self_text: I'm looking to play games like Gacha Life or other similar ones and want to find something where there aren't too many laggy players

title: Is there a way to fix my PC without having to buy a new one?
self_text: My PC isn't running too well. When gaming it gets really hot and starts to lag at random times. I also notice when the fans are on they make a really annoying whirring noise.  I don't have much experience with computer hardware so I am not sure where to start fixing it myself.

title: What does your favorite character from any series love?
self_text: This could be anything! A random food? A color? An animal? Anything goes!

title: Do you think the actors in the movies were paid?
self_text: What if the movie was made in 2024 or later and they had to pay for it. Is there any evidence of them getting paid? If so, how much do they get paid?

title: Are there any good apps for tracking my credit score?
self_text: There's been an increase in scams lately where people will call and ask for your social security number etc., so I want something trustworthy and easy to use.  I know Credit Karma exists, but I was wondering if there were other options too.  Thank you!

title: Does anyone else have trouble getting the right amount of coins?
self_text: I’m playing the first time and I can never seem to get enough coins to buy upgrades when I see an enemy or I just find myself in a situation where I need to upgrade something. I’ve seen some people saying it’s not possible to get more than 1500 which is so wrong because I got over 3000 on my first playthrough. Is there any way to get more or do I just have bad luck finding more?

title: Is it weird that I like being yelled at?
self_text: There's something about hearing my parents yell at me that makes me feel safe and loved. Like they care enough to get mad at me. And it feels good knowing that if they got angry with me, then I have done something wrong in their eyes.

title: Is it weird if I like being alone?
self_text: Hey everyone I just wanted to ask something and get some perspective on whether or not it's weird to really enjoy being by yourself and only socializing with your friends when you know they're available to hang out, otherwise you don't contact them at all. Like, I love spending my days doing things I want to do alone, and I don't mind being around people but I don't force myself to hang out with anyone unless they invite me.  I don't feel lonely and in fact, I feel more relaxed being by myself.  I think it's just because I've been alone for so long since I was a kid but now that I'm older, I have an easier time doing things alone without feeling insecure about it.   I guess what I am asking is does it sound strange to say I'm comfortable and content being alone most of the time?  Like would it be weird for other people to judge me for enjoying my own company too much?
